summary: This is a replacer for dust effect textures.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Installation[/heading]
Via a mod manager or manually merge into the data folder.
[b]
[color=#00ff00][u]Texture Size Options[/u]
Version 1.0: 1024 x1024
Version 0.25: 256 x256[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2407]> SSE version by Darkjesusmn[/url]
[line]
